amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities, Counties, and Other Political Subdivisions
amendatorysection.para: Independent actuary shall mean a member in good standing of the Society of Actuaries or the American Academy of Actuaries who is not an employee of the plan sponsor. Selection of an independent actuary by a plan sponsor shall comply with the conflict of interest provisions of the Nebraska Political Accountability and Disclosure Act.

crossreference.para: Nebraska Political Accountability and Disclosure Act, see section 49-1401.
